divs: Sighting DetailsThe whole family was inside watching tv my husband went outside to get something and opened the door screaming for us to come out and we did ,we saw over 200 star-like objects traveling in high speed from south to north the star -like objects were blinking blue green white lights...i would describe them like a herd of bees because of the speed and the way they were traveling all together. A lifetime experience for the family if i would not have seen it with my own eyes i would have not believe it.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around August 4th 2012
Summary: we saw over 200 starlike objests travel from south to north in very high speed like a herd of bees.
